item.content:encoded:
Pawsome Friend Kitty Cat Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Postcard

Hot Review! Pawsome Friend Kitty Cat Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Postcard – Valentines Day Cards Pawsome Friend Kitty Cat Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Postcard products are in stock Pawsome Friend Kitty Cat Galentine’s Day Greeting Holiday Postcard Try to read more firstThis funny and cute Valentine’s Day card is a light and sweet way to show your friend love on this special holiday. It features the phrase, "You’re the most paw-some friend!" with a hand-drawn heart and kitty cat on top of a simple blush pink background and white frame. You can customize the message on the inside to say whatever you’d like. The color scheme includes blush pink, medium pink, black, bright red, golden yellow, and white. It’s fun, modern, trendy, sweet, adorable, and cool.

***IMPORTANT DESIGN NOTE: For any custom design request such as matching product requests, color changes, placement changes, or any other change request, please click on the "MESSAGE" button or email the designer directly at [email protected]. You can even email her a request for a completely custom and new design. Price:$1.45
